topics.content: 2:01am EDT     Inox Wind Ltd:Has bagged an order for a 100 MW wind power project at Lahori, in the state of Madhya Pradesh from Ostro Energy.Says Ostro Energy is baked by Actis, a global pan-emerging maket private equity frim with $7.6 bln of funds under management..
topics.title: Inox Wind Ltd Wind Bags 100 MW Order from OSTRO Energy
